titles.title: Proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States allowing an item veto in appropriations bills and an item veto of contract authority or taxation changes in any other bill.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: 1/4/1995--Introduced. Constitutional Amendment - Grants the President item veto authority with respect to legislation concerning appropriations, contract authority, or tax changes.
